description: A full-body rejuvenation experience including massage, steam bath, and aromatherapy.
Daily guided yoga sessions with meditation and breathing exercises.
Herbal steam therapy with detoxifying oils and relaxing environment.
Heated stone massage to relax muscles and improve circulation.
Essential oil treatments to boost mood and relieve stress.
Guided hikes through scenic mountain trails with safety gear.
Wall climbing with instructor guidance and full safety harness.
High-altitude zipline adventure over scenic valleys.
White water rafting with trained professionals and gear.
Fly high with certified pilots and scenic aerial views.
Access to indoor heated pool with lifeguard and poolside drinks.
Fully-equipped fitness center with trainer and personalized plans.
Nature trail cycling with snacks, water, helmet and guide.
Fun, high-energy dance workout sessions with professional trainers.
Punch bag training, gloves provided, personal trainer sessions.
VR headset gaming with multiplayer and motion sensors.
Indoor games including PlayStation, Xbox, and racing simulators.
Classic games like chess, carrom, Monopoly with comfy seating.
Private mini-theatre with free popcorn and beverage.
Classic arcade setup with ticket rewards and joystick fun.
Learn regional cuisines with a professional chef and live tasting.
Canvas and supplies included for guided painting sessions.
Hands-on clay sculpting and pottery wheel experience.
Learn traditional and modern styles from trained instructors.
Live acoustic band, karaoke options, and open mic.
Decorations, cake, photography, music, and dining area.
Candlelight dinner, roses, customized cake and wine.
Exclusive venue access, DJ, lights, snacks and drinks.
Cartoon themes, games, bouncy castle, cupcakes and goodies.
Romantic décor, violinist, roses, personalized dinner.
5-course gourmet meal with live music and candlelight setup.
Exclusive wine varieties with cheese platters and sommelier.
Unlimited multi-cuisine spread with desserts and beverages.
Grilled meats and veggies by the pool with soft lights.
Elegant tea selection with pastries, snacks, and calm ambiance.
Guided morning trail to spot exotic bird species.
Night sky exploration with telescopes and expert talk.
Guided walk through botanical gardens and forest edges.
Lush lawn reserved with snacks, mats, and games.
Riding with trainers, helmets, and countryside view.
Intro to AI, fun projects and real-time demos.
Fly drones with instructor in open field.
Hands-on 3D model creation and print session.
Fun coding games using Scratch and Blockly.
Augmented Reality tour of hotel and surroundings.
30-minute foot therapy with herbal oils.
Private library with coffee and cozy recliners.
Soundproof zone with guided voice meditation.
Smart recliners with mood lighting for deep naps.
Luxury bathtub soak with salts, candles, and soft music.
